website_summaries.verdict: A good wireless choice built for exercise and outdoor sports.
pros: Latest Bluetooth offers quick, seamless pairing and enhanced audio transmission
Waterproof design is practical for physical activity
Comes with 3 earbud options for comfort
cons: Some complaints that they're actually not as durable as marketed

customer_reviews.title: For $60.00 it's a NO from me. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: First decent impressions...seems solidly built for wrap around ear buds, easy to press buttons, pairs easily, extra tips for sizing. Negatives and the biggest reason I returned...the sound is flat no bass to mention. Sound is clear just flat. I was expecting a bit more range for the $60.00. If you listen to music and enjoy a nice bass response, pass on these. I have had better listening experience for ear buds that cost $30.00, although they are not built as good.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pair and mic is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have several headsets. I buy them all the time. I tested 3 headsets: ten-year-old Plantronics headset, bose wired headphones and these. These were by far the worst sounding on the recording I made to a voicemail system. The Plantronics were better than the WIRED bose. These Philips BASS+ SHB4385 sound good but they won't be the full solution for those who want to have a conversation with them.
customer_reviews.author: S.A

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I'm very surprised to hear how strong basses are and how clear high sounds are. I have switched from JBL E25BT and honestly wasn't expecting this sounds quality considering how cheap the material feels like. Sadly, I didn't get any other size ear tips which is promised in the description. (Edit: My bad, I found them)
customer_reviews.author: Engin

customer_reviews.title: Bad pairing issues.  Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say anything about the battery life or the noise cancelation Because I didn't keep them along enough to test that part. They stay in your ear really well with that little tiny wing that sticks out. I really like that because I have had trouble getting them to stay in. I'm going to order another pair hoping that the pairing issues I'm having are just with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected disappointment!!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a wide recognizable brand I was expecting more for what it offered, I have used different brands in the past and this is at the bottom of all of them, you can’t connect to two different devices simultaneously, it’s hard to swap between devices connectivity. The quality it okay but the ear buds are somewhat uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Esc-Fam

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have great sounds they are very comfortable. They do cut off between right and left sometimes that can be annoying. battery life is ok. If the connection was better. I'll give 5 stats.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Z

customer_reviews.title: Terrible controls
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is acceptable, but the controls are awful. The only controls are a power button, and a pair of hard-to-feel up/down buttons on the inside of the left arm of the neckband. To skip to the next track, you need to hold the up/down buttons for 2 seconds. So, if you want to skip 5 tracks, you'll spend 10 seconds waiting for the controls to respond. It's excruciating. Otherwise, the quality is pretty good. If you have your device in hand and can use that to skip tracks, or you rarely change tracks, you're set. But if you're a playlist hopper like me, you'll hate headphones.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDopp

customer_reviews.title: It’s Ok...I guess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for conference calls on my desktop PC and it does work, bu the sound periodically drops as if the Bluetooth connection is not in full sync with the PC. Not sure why...but that aside, I guess it works.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: no dang wires.long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well,xtra inserts,different sizes.long battery life.better than my beats that died.only gripe: they have good bass capability but you have to push them in by hand and hold them.generally i just use them for watching/ listening to you tube.range is good.cant speak for the phone call capability....haha...i dont answer anyway,i,m retired...leave a voice mail,i,ll call you later...i,m watching Flair or top 10 mystery crap.i just like to be able to get up,walk around ...no wires.pretty much thrilled.longevity guess we,ll see.🤔
customer_reviews.author: mjv

customer_reviews.title: Good range, good battery, good mic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who needed a better headset for her work-from-home meetings. She loves this headset, saying it is _MUCH_ better than the other options she had, which were picking up the sounds of her roommate who would also be on calls, nearby. * The mic isolates well so only her voice comes through, no nearby talkers. * Audio is of excellent quality. * Battery life will take you through an all day meeting. * Bluetooth stays connected over a very good range.
customer_reviews.author: xmnboy

customer_reviews.title: Not great...
customer_reviews.text: I get good sound when listening to music and incoming calls. However my callers have a hard time hearing me and the noice cancelling is non existant. Battery life sucks because it stays on if you forget to turn it off. My old LG automatically turned off or on sleep mode when it was not in use which preserved the battery life. Its not great. I kept it because I needed something handsfree and that wouldnt get lost easily.
customer_reviews.author: PinkShoe1

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My Leophile Eel headset died recently and I had to go back to my kinda dead LG Tone. This Philips headset takes the best of both and result is fantastic! The comfort of the Eel: smooth & light but with magnetic attachment to make then more secure. The Sound of the LG Harmon Kardon but in HIGH DEF! Sweat\H2O Proof is key as I can be a fountain and I live in Seattle! Ran them from 7am to 9pm before they Started to complain!
customer_reviews.author: BS Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The earphone works w/ Bluetooth and non-Bluetooth devices
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it has a Bluetooth function for smartphones, and also it has this portal where you can plug into a computer/phone with its plugin wire, so that you don’t have to worry about pairing twice with your phone and computer via Bluetooth. When I am done with work,I can also use it for gym/hikes since the design is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Mic is very Bad - Don't Buy if you Plan to Call Someone from it
customer_reviews.text: No one hears me when I use this headphones to make a call; everyone says your voice is very far away we can't hear you. I didn't have this issue with other wireless headphones; so for me this is completely useless. One more thing, when the case battery dies, the headphones automatically assumes you picked it up for use so it auto-connects with your phone which basically puts your phone in silent mode! I missed many calls due to this issue whenever I leave the case uncharged overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Nader S.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were great until you walk away and only have one in then the person cannot hear you. So you have to take both with you in order to walk away. Range is super short only two bedrooms in my home and it cuts out. You cannot leave on on the base or it will automatically shut the other one off. For some reason FaceTime will not connect with it. I will not purchase again or suggest to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Billy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Middle of the road quality. Not very loud. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Just got it
customer_reviews.text: So far I want to believe that it is not only good quality but also that protects my health. I read it complies with the limits for a class B FCC Pursuant to part 15. But there is more info should be described for the final user. Part 15 gives a lot of explanation about what covers. They are kind of bulky but i am getting familiar with them and i am so far satisfied with them. I cannot say anything about the battery life, I start with them as soon as i got them with the charged it was sent from the vendor. Will see after full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Avila Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and earplugs stay in
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable lightweight head set. Earplugs are set at an angle so they stay in and have different size ear foams so one can get the perfect fit for the ear canal. Buttons are easy to use to turn power on and off and answer phone. Have only used these for audiobooks so no review on music sound but great for books. Not made for sound cancelling but outside is bearly audible.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Jan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage headset with garbage support
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Microphone stopped working for phone calls the day after the return window. Amazon tech support and Phillips support are both useless.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Joe

customer_reviews.title: Skinny wiring with no strain relief
customer_reviews.text: These sound great and all, but have one fatal flaw. NO STRAIN RELIEF on the cables. So in about 2 months they developed a short right where it connects to the neckband. And the wires are also very thin. I expected a lot more for this price and a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi4444

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Sound cancellation, lightweight, and the sound quality is amazing. I am always on the go so it is convenient to have them on so that I can be hands free. They have amazing range and I can usually listen to them for 14 hours straight before they start dying.
customer_reviews.author: Aleah Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Overall great sound and product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sounded earbuds! They have a very interesting design but they fit perfectly in my ears! They came with different size ear pieces so they should fit all ears! The bass is awesome and the battery life is great! I'd recommend these if anyone is in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Kailey G.

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR EVERYDAY USE
customer_reviews.text: After using these for taking 7 days a week as truck driver this product is deemed a failure. Ear buds crackling and distorted after only 6 weeks. DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: cnote024

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had better battery life
customer_reviews.text: Don't know where 14 hours talk time comes from, since ANC is always on you maybe have 14 hours standby time. I'm not sure what the real talk time is. I cannot use these with that kind of stand by time, no matter how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: M. Milliron

customer_reviews.title: The wires are a half inch too short
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She likes everything about them except that the wires are a wee bit too short and she can feel them tugging on her ears when she turns her head. Other than that she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: MLTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Works well at home but while out running the sounds breaks up and gets static. Also some times they don’t charge when in the case for many hours. Other than that they cancel noise well and fit really comfortably in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds that don’t fall out
customer_reviews.text: I received these earphones today and used them most of the afternoon after a 2 hour charge. The sound is very good and the earbuds actually stay in my ears, something I’ve always struggled with and the reason why I had previously given up on earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: The battery does not provide 14 hours of playback
customer_reviews.text: I have used the headphones for a week and the battery does not provide 14 hours of playback. I only used the headphones for cell phone calls, so their use would be about two hours a day and I have to recharge every 36-48 hours
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Amaya

customer_reviews.title: FRUSTRATED WITH PHILLIPS BUDS
customer_reviews.text: extremely frustrated with the connectivity issues I had with two pairs of these earbuds. (iPhone 10) which has no problems connecting or staying connected. The left bud constantly cut in and out . I was a loyal phillips user but now I am too frustrated. I got Enacfire buds for cheaper and they work much better, no connectivity issues. however the phillips sounded great and were extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sneden

customer_reviews.title: Left ear crapped out after two months of daily use
customer_reviews.text: I like the headphones a lot, so I was disappointed when the left ear started cutting out intermittently today. For $60, I would really have liked to get a bit more use out of them. As far as I can tell, there is no manufacturer's warranty, and the return window through Amazon has since closed. If you're planning on wearing them often and for long periods of time, I don't think I could recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible....
customer_reviews.text: I liked them at first, but the battery life stinks. I get about four hours, no where near what they're supposed to be. There not for people who like more bass or low end sound. I ended up getting wireless ear buds which I wish I would have got in the first place. All in all they are alright, but not for the money. I did end up keeping them for a spare because I missed my return date. I was bummed because the reviews were great. Maybe I just got a bad pair???
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money, though advertised as Phillips a piece of crap, please becareful.I received these instead of advertised Phillips earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: strawberry

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality but comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable headphones and connects well with the phone but sound quality is not great. If you want good sound quality stay away from this head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Dado

customer_reviews.title: No too comfortable on the ears.  Bruises my ear canal.
customer_reviews.text: Sound was good. Heavy bass. But after an hour of using them they started to hurt my ears. Need to design better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hall

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound but didn't last more than a month
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working soon after I bought it. Too bad, because I think it had potential despite not tripping well to my neck during decline bench presses. It's not worth replacing. Ironically, the cheaper Method wireless by Skullcandy that got me to buy these because I like the design concept still are usable despite losing some grip on the buttons. Maybe I got a bum set, but won't be risking my money on these again.
customer_reviews.author: Timofey Davidovich

customer_reviews.title: worked for until just past the return window date!
customer_reviews.text: after 5 weeks of use, folx i was talking with reported loud static that became way too loud when i spoke, randering the headphones useless. too bad bc they were $50 and now i cannot return them. also the lady in the phone kepts saying "volume is at maximum" unprompted and volume was never at maximum, i just figured it was an annoying gliltch.
customer_reviews.author: Eve N.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these is very good. Initially the battery life was good. But only after a few months of use, the unit cuts off within seconds of turning it on, and that is after the unit has been charging all day. I'm having to look for an alternative brand/model as the battery will no longer hold a charge. Extremely disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan P.

customer_reviews.title: You receive a different model likes others have said
customer_reviews.text: Like others are saying. What the description says about which model it is and the features that model has is different then the model you actually get. Mine is a 4000 series with 12 hour battery life and ipx4 waterproof. Not sure if all the differences but you don’t get what is described.
customer_reviews.author: chris malda

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for watching movies
customer_reviews.text: Bulky looking but they don't feel bulky. Best I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: All American Mall

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality, fragile. High price.
customer_reviews.text: The right side earbud stopped working entirely a little over a month after purchase. All at once, with no warning. The bud itself and the wires, all other components of the headset appear to be intact. For $50 I expected quite a bit more in terms of build quality, and will be returning to using a spare Samsung set I own until a replacement can be found
customer_reviews.author: Luke Mash

customer_reviews.title: Very good excellent
customer_reviews.text: The best i like it very much sound exelent verry good price
customer_reviews.author: ali nehme fardous

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for price!
customer_reviews.text: No where to dock unused earbud and tend to fall off when upside down, not hugging your neck tight enough. I use these at work and work on cars and I'm upside down daily.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl G.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: product has good long rage reception room to room in the house and outside on deck.
customer_reviews.author: EllisHudgins

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that these earphones are not loud enough. I used this brand before and I liked them, but these have very low sound. Even at the highest volume.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is ok. The issue is that it will not allow you to make calls. It defeats much of the purpose due to the fact that it won’t allow you the ability to do them.
customer_reviews.author: big daddy

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Discovered I can use them in rather ear. Use the right one by it's self in the left ear when diving So I can hear passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Only good for music, not calls. Everytime i use it for a call they ask me. "Am i on speaker?" They arent particularly comfortable, Nor is the sound great. The battery life isn't nearly as good as it claims either.
customer_reviews.author: Yehuda

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is important to know
customer_reviews.text: Of all the bluetooth headsets that I bought this one is the worst as far as battery life. I wish I could return it. I have used maybe 3 times. I strongly dislike this product
customer_reviews.author: Denise Williams

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The ear buds aren’t the normal shaped earbuds would of been nice to know that before ordering what a load of crap. They fall out of my ears. Such crap
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey graham

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: fits in easily, is soft and conforms to ear--doesn't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: funwfood

customer_reviews.title: O
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. I wear them while working in construction. Blocks out noise well and doesnt get caught on tool belt or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: Nice headset, only one issue doesn’t tell you battery life when you turn it on. It will tell you when it’s low while using them just would be nice to know as you turn them on so you can charge them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent. However build quality is poor. Cap fell off after just 1 day of use. Not expected from Philips.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn-The-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: One of the two stopped working/recharging reliably after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones but the ear phones dont have a place to go when you take them out and dangle annoyingly on your chest.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: What expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im not an sound expert but I like a good sound on headphones and these really are what I expected for.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I wear these primarily when I’m going to sleep to listen to audio books. They’re well worth the money for this purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need Replacement/Refund.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and it’s not working. It keeps disconnecting from my laptop when i play music there is some wired noose disturbances in there. Not working at all . Need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ashutosh yadav

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than expected, I use them at the skatepark and they’ve never even tried to slip out of my ears, the sound quality is great and the battery life is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: wesley lunt

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Use these guys for work because my work van is super loud, they're perfect for canceling the noise. Battery life could be better but the sound quality and Bluetooth distance makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality earbuds, beautiful and it has an amazing sound. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Philips design with a great quality; it is also very easy and simple to pair. I had other brands before but I would say this is the best one I had so far
customer_reviews.author: Mineral USA LLC

customer_reviews.title: They are great
customer_reviews.text: They fall out of my ears alot but I move around alt and I have little ears.
customer_reviews.author: TB Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset because it’s very lightweight. It has great sound. There additional sizes for the ear pieces. Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they quit working after a week
customer_reviews.text: I thought i found the ultimate headphones they fit great and sounded great but they quit working after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Deck

customer_reviews.title: Compact and fit under my stocking hat.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I mainly use it for music .
customer_reviews.author: Bill Peltir

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: Wondering if there’s any traveling case for these bad boys!?! Can’t complain work good so far👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good No need for over priced ones with a name
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective pair
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the volume was pretty low and the left earbud never once connected. I returned the same day
customer_reviews.author: nathanael housman

customer_reviews.text: Half my calls are so hard to hear. And others are perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Parish

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable, decent noise canceling, and really good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great just one line i want to say go for it worth the price
customer_reviews.author: payal ramoliya

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working with calls all together. Would like to return
customer_reviews.author: Todd Woodhouse

product_meta.title: Philips Audio Performance PN402BK Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds with Vibration Call Alert Neckband, Black
product_meta.description: Style:Vibrating neckband + IPX4| Size:Wireless In-Ear| Color:BlackDon't miss a beat. These water-resistant wireless headphones boast a slim neckband for convenient use. Earbuds in or earbuds out, you will know where they are. Vibration Mode alerts you when there is a call, and you get 14 hours play time.
feature_bullets: IPX4 waterproof. These headphones boast an IPX4 waterproof rating, which means they’re resistant to sustained moisture.
Up to 14 hours play time. With Rapid charge, you get another 2 hours of talk time with just 5 minutes of charging.
Vibration Mode. Neckband vibrates when a call comes in, ensuring you won’t miss a call, even if you’re deep into your music or have the earbuds around your neck.
Echo Cancellation: With our acoustic echo cancellation, you always get a clear, undisturbed connection.
Slender neckband. Comfortable even if you wear it all day
Detailed sound. Powerful bass: The 12. 2mm neodymium drivers are tuned to deliver clear midrange frequencies and a deep bass, perfect for music and conversations.
Smart Pairing: The headphones are ready to pair the instant you switch on Bluetooth. Once they're paired, they remember the last device they were paired with.
Included Components: Headphones, Usb Cable, Ear Caps: 3 Sizes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars605 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
